attributes.action: Ban the culling of Chicks in Industrial Chicken farms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British chicken/egg farming industry produces thousands of chicks a year. The majority of these are Male and so useless for egg production. Instead of being kept for meat production the majority are culled by inhumane methods.
For example:

*Maceration, using a large high-speed grinder into which the chicks are fed.

*Burying alive. 

*Gases or gas mixtures, often carbon dioxide is used to induce death.

These methods seem fit for Nazi concentration camps than for a British Industry. In the wake of World Food Crisis I put it to the government to Ban the culling of Male chicks; and so I propose that it must be mandatory by law to use them for meat production. So they are not wasted and killed inhumanely
